original: In the heart of a small town, tucked away in a dilapidated apartment building, lived a brilliant mathematician named Dr. Vincent Alexander. For years, Vincent had been plagued by a single question that consumed his every waking moment: Does God truly exist? This enigma had driven him to the brink of insanity, causing him to lock himself away from society, dedicating his life to finding the elusive
